title: Well Connected: Social-Emotional Learning and Wellbeing Enhancement Program for University Students in STEM Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of social-emotional learning (SEL) and college life experience
context.additional_context: A program addressing emotional difficulties experienced by science students during academic and career preparation. Ensuring field applicability through community-based participatory research (CBPR) and the ADDIE model

learning_goals: Students can apply stress management and emotional regulation strategies in real-life situations with over 80% accuracy.
Students improve their social relationship-building skills through five or more peer feedback sessions during the semester.
Students report a 30% or greater increase in well-being awareness via post-program surveys.
Students utilize a community support system with over 70% participation while preparing for science-related career paths.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
